faqs.question: How do you guarantee results?
faqs.answer: Every strategy we recommend has been tested at The Anchor first. We've increased our food GP from 58% to 71%, grown quiz nights from 20 to 35 regulars, and saved ¬£250/week on Sunday lunch waste. If you don't see similar improvements within 30 days, you get your money back.

faqs.question: Do you work with pubs outside of Surrey?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with pubs across the UK. Everything is done remotely, and we use video calls for consultations. The strategies work regardless of location because they're based on human psychology and proven marketing principles.

faqs.question: How much time will this take from my day?
faqs.answer: That's the whole point - to give you time back! Initial setup requires some collaboration (usually 2-3 calls), but once systems are in place, they run themselves. Our automation saves me 25+ hours per week at The Anchor.

faqs.question: What if I'm not tech-savvy?
faqs.answer: Perfect! Neither was I when I started. I'll handle all the technical setup and provide simple, step-by-step instructions for anything you need to do. Most clients need less than 30 minutes of training.

faqs.question: Can you help with specific challenges like empty Mondays or poor food sales?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We create custom solutions for your specific challenges. Empty Mondays? We'll design events that work. Poor food sales? We'll optimize your menu and training. Every solution is tailored to your pub.

faqs.question: How quickly will I see results?
faqs.answer: Most clients see improvements within 2-4 weeks. Social media automation shows results immediately, menu changes take 2-3 weeks to show in GP, and events usually fill up faster within the first month.
